metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3660 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cockpit (and its plugins) do not seem to protect itself against clickjacking. It is possible to render a page from a cockpit server via another website, inside an <iFrame> HTML entry. This may be used by a malicious website in clickjacking or similar attacks.

criterions.comment: cockpit package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
